Package photos

Class OpenAlbumController

java.lang.Object
photos.OpenAlbumController
public class OpenAlbumController extends Object
Controller for the OpenAlbumController scene, dealing with OpenAlbumController functions.
Author:
Prajit Kundu, Howard Luo
